website_summaries.verdict: Classic straight razor that features a single carbon steel blade attached to a mahogany handle. Not disposable like modern straight razors, so it's recommended for experienced shavers.
pros: Vintage barbershop design with an ergonomic, bow-shaped handle for comfortable handling at all angles
Hollow handle allows the wet blade to dry quickly
Blade has been hand-sharpened by the manufacturer with 8,000-mesh stone to achieve superior sharpness
Simple yet attractive design at an affordable price
cons: Blade isn’t disposable, so proper maintenance of blade oiling and stropping is essential to the longevity of the razor

customer_reviews.text: Bought this razor because of your description but it doesn't shave at all, period. I've used straight razors for over 25 years. I still have one made in the 1960's that actually shaves. This one does absolutely nothing
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: refined old school razor
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fervent fan of the old-fashioned razor since my father taught me to shave since a teenager. Compared to the modern electric razor, it gives you more sharp and clean hair-cut result without giving you razor bumps if used properly. This razor is made from China and the quality is superb-especially considering it's cheap price. The wooden body part is made of fine wood which you can definitely feel it and the steel blade is sharp enough to cut the most detailed and ingrown part of the hair. It has a hollow area in between the wood so it gives much more hygienic feeling keeping it stored.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Update to NOT Shave-ready
customer_reviews.text: Update----->>>This is an update from two stars to five stars. Very soon after I posted the review below, the seller contacted me and offer me a refund or a new razor. Since I like how the razor looks, I chose a new razor. This time it came shave-ready. You have to value this type of customer service and a seller who supports his product like this. Definitively deserves a five-star rating. I obviously recommend this product. ======================================================================================================== Old review------>>>>It didn't arrive ready to shave as claimed. I try stropping it and it's not sharpening at all. Ordered a set of wet stones to try to hone it and sharpen it to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The scale is loose as you hold the razor straight and it is a little off center when it closes but it does not the blade does not hit the scale other than that I am very impressed it seems to be holding an edge very good after about 2 weeks of Shaving
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this straight razor I purchase some that said they were shaved ready but this one was really shave ready I strapped it about 50 times and it is sharp. The scale is loose as you hold the razor straight and it is a little off center when it closes but it does not the blade does not hit the scale other than that I am very impressed it seems to be holding an edge very good after about 2 weeks of Shaving. I would give it a five if the scale was tighter and it closed much Center to the scale recommend this play
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality classic straight razor
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a straight razor before, so I decided to try it on my own. After studying the offers, I chose the brand Zertone, because it has the optimal combination of price and quality, judging by the reviews. The razor came to me very quickly, just a day later, despite the General delays in delivery. The razor has a good comfortable case made of soft, moisture-resistant leatherette. In my case, the handle of the razor is made of natural wood. Sharpening the razor immediately allowed you to shave. The quality of steel corresponds to the declared one. There are no chips or rust marks on the blade. I recommend buying for all lovers of classic shaving.
customer_reviews.author: inzheneher

customer_reviews.title: Very good straight razor for price
customer_reviews.text: The straight razor arived sharp enough to cut longer hairs, but certainly not sharp enough to give me a close shave. If you are expecting this to be ready right out of the box you are going to be dissapointed. That being said it is still extremely sharp and will be shave ready with a little bit more sharpening and a go over with a stromp. Most straight razors will run in the +$100 range, which is a pretty big gamble if you have never used a straight razor before. So at this price point I would definitely reccomend this razor to someone who is considering trying it out. However if you do get this learn how to stromp.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Wrangler

customer_reviews.title: Works great would recommend but you must have a strop
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package it seems really dull and I was not able to cut my hair at all but after a few passes on the strop it was a super sharp my only complaint is it came It came with a leather sheath with a sticker on it but the sticker leaves a gooey residue. For beginners I recommend using a traditional razor for the tricky spots Full disclosure I was compensated for my review but that does not change my opinion on the product they tried to bribe me to give a 5 star review but I refused
customer_reviews.author: Chris sawyer 123

customer_reviews.title: Razor Sharp, Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: Great craftsmanship and it comes with its own case. Just what I expected in a Straight Edge Razor. I was able to easily follow an instructional video I found online and give myself a close shave just like at the barber. I recommend buying this with a strop as you will want to keep it sharp after each use and a few runs on the strop will do that. You will also learn how to care for a blade well with this razor as it keeps its razor sharpness and its edge by being a true carbon steel razor.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Horne

customer_reviews.title: TRUST, research (if beginning) and very worth every dime!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY much a beginner, but the reason for the (one) less star is that I’ve NEVER used this and I did a LOT of research before even my first attempt (on myself). I bought this for my husband and until I showed him what I learned (on myself) he wouldn’t dare. I’ve never received any type of schooling but the blade was PERFECT for me! And YES still married (same husband) lol NO cuts at all. It is a very good and close shave, I’m very proud of myself and the trust in my marriage still intact 😊
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Did not cut
customer_reviews.text: This did not cut my tough beard at all. Update 4/5/2019: The seller, ATShoper, keeps begging me to change my one star review. They said that I shouldn't expect a 15.99usd razor to be very good. They also sent me a $30 razor to see if it would be better. I could tell that it was sharper than the first one but it still would not cut my whiskers. But I changed the stars to 2 stars because they tried to send a better razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Baker

customer_reviews.title: Poorly sharpened. Doesn't hold edge long. But...
customer_reviews.text: This non-US made straight razor arrived poorly sharpened. Its steel, or metal, doesn't hold an edge long. Unless you enjoy stropping constantly, remember this. On the positive side, it is the only affordable straight razor sold here that does NOT require inserting, disposable razor blades. So it's not just for show, requiring purchasing blade-inserts, but the steel--looks like steel-- is inferior to US or European steel. A cost versus quality decision.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: personel opinion
customer_reviews.text: why i rated it. well one. I don't know if a beginner should start with a straight razor. must be really careful.otherwise you'll cut yourself, easy to use. depends on who's using it. may be way to hard for some. nice straight razor. for the money. sharp but not super sharp. had to hone and strop alot to get it sharp enough, but when done worked as well as you would expect a straight razor to work.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Dull and does not hold an edge at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking with some stropping it will be sharp enough to shave. The edge of this razor was is so dull out of the box that even half an hour is stropping did not help. Even a wet stone could not make it work. Findlay after 2 days and hours of trying to make it work I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My first (and last) straight razor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first (and last) straight razor. I cannot stress enough what a positive it is that the blade doesn't pass the dropping hair test. It can be very cheaply and easily sharpened when you're ready but a beginner could kill themselves with a fully sharpened razor. As it is, it gets beautifully close shaves and it's so affordable you're better off buying this and getting it sharpened rather than going after a pricy blade. The metal and handle are both very good quality and I'm so glad I was able to find this affordable door into a new world of shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal with Excellent Results
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an excellent deal. After a few minutes of initial stropping (you really need to do this before your initial use), my first shave was close and nick free. The razor feels well made, and it is aesthetically pleasing. I suspect it will stand the test of time and continue giving good shaves for many years.
customer_reviews.author: MickyS

customer_reviews.title: Hurts too much.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s because it was inexpensive or it is just not good enough. I know when a razor pulls and hurts and this thing hurts. I’ve been shaving for 40 years and I know when you buy a new pack of Gillett or even Kirkland multi blade razors that they don’t hurt one bit right out of the package. Maybe a strop would help but I expected it to not hurt like hell on the first draw. I might look for more expense models. I’m still interested in saving money by using a straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Straight razor
customer_reviews.text: Don’t listen to the negative reviews, This is an awesome straight razor worth every penny. I ran mine across a strap 15 times and it was hair popping sharp. I would highly recommend this straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: James J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful razor
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I have not had the chance to use this razor, but my first impression is great. I truly didn't expect much with the price being so low, but the product seems to be well made, and very attractive. I am expanding my collection to include razors and this is a great first addition. Will update after use, which may never happen, as this was somewhat of an impulse purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DPAZ

customer_reviews.title: No response customer service. Do not buy this razor
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally review poor items, I would just return them. But this review is for poor customer service rather than product. I read the reviews beforehand and based my my expectations accordingly. But the blade has a nick in it. So from manufacturers response to poor reviews I reached out to the manufacturer with my concerns. To which I was ignored. So I did not expect finest blade out of the box, but damaged is different. But no response is not ok by me. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Not practical or useful to me
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to shave with this product no matter how much time spent sharpening it. Maybe my beard is too tough,but I doubt it
customer_reviews.author: Jameswilson

customer_reviews.title: Not Sharp :(
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get a shave with this. After 200+ swipes on the strop it was still unable to cut hair on my neck. it grinds over my skin pulling facial hair and leaving skin red yet hair remains. It did however manage to shave the fine hairs just below my sideburns. Unfortunately I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great Blade!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: This company sent me two new razors to make up for the rusted ones I received. Very pleased with the new blades! :) OLD REVIEW: I bought two of these. Thinking I'll have a backup for when and if the first got worn out. Both arrived rusted at the ends. The blade itself wasn't rusted, but still a new product shouldn't be rusted at all.
customer_reviews.author: DAAscia

customer_reviews.title: Update Apr 28. Sharp. Clean shave.Just strop 20X or so. It's good to go.
customer_reviews.text: Sharpened it with 20X or strokes on my strop. Just make sure the blade is straight and even and doesn't lean to one side. It shaved cleanly. Make sure you practice first to avoid slicing your face. Wipe dry after use. Oil it all over. I use lithium spray.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Nimitz

customer_reviews.title: The blade is as only worth using as a paperweight, but the scales are decent
customer_reviews.text: The blade is worthless, but I just wanted the scales. As for shave ready, this is a laugh. Just for entertainment value, I tried to shave with it. It wouldn't catch a single hair, much less cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Just this guy, you know?

customer_reviews.title: Great razor for beginners and anyone that's interested in starting wet shaving with straight razors
customer_reviews.text: This i a great razor. I have been using it for a few months now and it usually holds up pretty well if you learn to strop it properly on a good quality strop. It might not hold up as well if you have thick and course facial or body hair, but for your average person it will be a good choise, especially now with the replaceable blades so expensive. Great product, especially for the price if you don't want to buy a $200+ razor when you are just a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Hello all, I'm new to this straight razor business. I ordered this razor as a way to try it out. The first razor that was delivered wasn't too sharp, even after stropping. I contacted the seller and they immediately sent out a replacement. The second one took an edge better! I have a light beard, so not sure how this razor would work for a real heavy beard. The razor itself has a great feel/balance to it. The seller seems very interested in doing whatever they can to satisfy!
customer_reviews.author: thomas j Johnston

customer_reviews.title: It not sharp
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the razor I tried shaving with it, but it was not even close to being sharp enough. In the items defense, I did not order a leather strap with it yet. I don't think it would have made much of a difference though. I sharpened it myself but it still is not as sharp as the disposable razors. The handle and weight of the razor are awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Very close shave, easy to strop & balanced perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son owns several different straight razors & uses all of them occasionally, but this set up is his favorite. He says it is easy to sharpen & strop & clean. The balance is better than others he has used & this one is his go-to when he wants that extra close, meticulous shave.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ingham

customer_reviews.title: Developed nasty rust spots after only 15 minutes of it being wet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking razor but the positives just kind of end there. It didn't shave very well, but that was not the worst thing. I know that you need to sharpen it so they get a pass for that. However I was using it in the shower and literally 15 minutes after I used it, it developed nasty rust spots on it that did not come off with anything. So it's obviously not good quality steel.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually far better than I expected. The handle is wood, seems well made, tight. The blade is very thick, but was very sharp on arrival. After several times across the strop, I was able to shave with it. For $20, this was way better than I ever expected, would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to give shaving with a straight razor a try.
customer_reviews.author: Heff

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok razor
customer_reviews.text: It's a general straight razor. Not as sharp as I'd hoped for. I haven't had it long so a review at this point would not give it justice if it were due but Amazon's already knocking at the door asking so..... I paid for the product why does it feel like I'm unpaid advertising for every purchase?......
customer_reviews.author: TAK

customer_reviews.title: Good blade and price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very decent straight razor and is definately worth the price, particularly if you are just getting into using straight razors. I have two minor issues with the razor: The first is the scales feel real light when compared to the blade. It doesn't impact the shave, but it feel awkward when stropping and honing. The second issue is the scales seem to be wider than most so it don't fit on the pedestal I have. Again none of these issues affect the actual shave and the price point is good for guys just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Anti-Blizzard

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing blade! I am a rookie and have the wounds to show it. I tried Dovo full hollow 5/8 and a Naked Armor one. This one blows them out of the water. It was shave ready out of the box amd then I stropped it and the shave was even better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my manfriend, HE LOVES IT, as soon as he got it he couldn’t tell me enough how good the craftsmanship and blade was, comes very sharp (May need to run it over strop to prepare for shave) he’s shaved with it a few times and it does a wonderful job. Very good for beginners or experts.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice razor for the price. Im using it as a training/demonstration aid for my sharpening business. I had a small issue at first but customer service is outstanding. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: pnwflyfisher

customer_reviews.title: Zertone Razor
customer_reviews.text: Razor seems to be well made. The blade is all one piece, not requiring replacement blades. My only concern is this razor does not "lock back." I think if you hold your hand over the extended blade arm this will help prevent closing and accidentally cutting yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Joseph Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have two more of these in my cart already! I have a professionally honed Dovo Best Quality razor I’ve been using for several years. I bought one of these to have stopped and handy razor for a quick shave and to practice honing razors. Mine required no honing! I hit the linen 25 laps and 50 on the leather and test shaved. Not terrible but not awesome. Went 25 laps on the diamond paste linen, bare linen, and then leather. Shaved fine! No real noticeable difference between this and my Dovo razor. The spine is a little crooked but it closes fine and shaved well. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has such a great price and because of that I was expecting a little bit of a cheap product, but I was very pleasantly surprised at how good of a razor this is. It arrived in a small leather pouch, which is very nice for storage and travel. It also is very weighty and is a very solid razor as well. Was sharp enough to shave straight out of the box and polished to an almost mirror finish. Great price and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Dull as a Spoon
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap. If you want it to cut hair or shave your face then you're out of luck. If you want it to pull your hair or slide right over it and do nothing then this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid middle of the road razor.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this Razor. I just learned to shave using my pocket knife. I was hopeful a razor would make things easier. It doesn't, no difference at all! I haven't nicked my self yet with it, though have quite a few times with my pocket knife, so maybe shaves a bit safer? Sharpens easily, and holds an edge fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received, but broken
customer_reviews.text: Partial review at this time. Received with a crack in the blade. Not sure who in particular is at fault. Seems it was packaged correctly. Build quality seems to be good other than the crack for the price, but I can't say much else about it at this time. UPDATE: So, within the day, the replacement was shipped. All the positive remains with this received one, minus the crack. Overall, I really like it, and it's good for the price. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emperor

customer_reviews.title: Comes decently sharp and seems fine but it is made of terrible quality metal
customer_reviews.text: It arrived decently sharp but it is made of materials so poor it will take way longer and way better sharpening tools than it should to maintain an edge. I have since bought another blade from a different company with much better results. This is typical cheap Chinese garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Charles Voisin

customer_reviews.title: Superb value. Solid performer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor to have an inexpensive one for traveling. This was a solid performer. I was definitely pleased. It arrived much sooner than I thought and was indeed ready to go w quick strop. And I had forgotten soap of any kind so had to shave w just water. After going two days. It still did very well, no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: John Rhilinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The razor is as it is in the description. Very good product for the price. The customer service however, is excellent. The razor arrived with a defect. I emailed the company directly with my issue and a picture of the defect and they sent me out a new razor no questions asked and it arrived extremely fast. They did not ask me to return the broken one. I would buy from this seller again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Bubb

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay this is great. The spine is not in line in the blade is not shave ready. However, with some good old spine straightening and sharpening this can be a great straight razor for the beginner. The materials are cheap but what do you expect for 16 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Possible scale issues but good seller
customer_reviews.text: Received the first one and the blade hit the scales. It was dramatic enough that sanding could not fix it without ruining the scales. The seller reached out to me and sent a new one. The grind on both is ok so be prepared to set a new bevel with a full progression when you hone it, but it's straight and manageable. Be sure to use a marker so you know you're grinding the cutting edge. If the seller maintains their customer service this is a safe purchase and why I updated this to a 4 from 2 with the useless scales.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gag gift
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t use this to shave. It was bought as a humorous gift for someone. As a novelty, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: bruinsfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Blade Need to Strop before shaving
customer_reviews.text: This blade is awesome for the price. It glides across my skin and gives such a smooth shave. It came pretty dull though so I had to strop the blade for a while but it's a great blade otherwise. It's super easy to use and I'm new to using a straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: John Dosch

customer_reviews.title: sharp razor.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor, so my wife and I could bond with her giving me a shave. The blade came sharp, and we went right into shaving. We thought it would be a Ghost moment (Patrick Swayze/ Demi Moore). It was more of a Carrie at the prom moment. Its a great razor. don't forget the Strop!
customer_reviews.author: WASSSUP!

customer_reviews.title: Great razor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am learning to transition from an old time safety razor to a straight razor. This razor is beautiful, and has a nice heft to it. The price is also reasonable, as quality straight razors can be rather expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: My electric razor gives a closer shave. I've honed the blade carefully using a whetstone, but it does not give a close face shave. I got one good shave out of it, but that's it. Great value, and a good beginner straight razor, but not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: You do have to sharpen the blade. It looks like quality steel. Mine is now sharp but I'm too chicken to use it. :/
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Decent for what you are paying for...
customer_reviews.text: Received about as sharp as a quality store bought kitchen knife.... If you have a whetstone, it can be sharpened to razor like quality. I have a 1000/6000 stone and after some time spent, it is much sharper. A finer stone will do much better. The steel seems fine... it just takes work to get it to what you may want. For $20 bucks, not a bad buy. Just be prepared to refine the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginner Straight Razor
customer_reviews.text: This razor is great for determining if shaving with a straight razor is for you. The quality is fine and the razor is inexpensive. I'm really glad I started with this and not a Dovo or blade of similar quality and reputation, even if I eventually purchase a such a blade.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great starter
customer_reviews.text: Good razor. I’ve never tried using a straight razor before but was always interested. It took me a lot of research and I chose this one. Already sharpened, good quality metal and the handle is real wood. Easy to handle. If you are new to this buy this razor and quit looking.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews before buying many said not shave ready and didn’t like the response of “strop it before using”. I did as suggested and am extremely happy with the quality and feel of this razor. Would recommend to someone not sure about spending big bucks on a straight razor as long as they understand both require basic maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blade but poorly manufactured handle
customer_reviews.text: The blade is easy to strop and get a nice edge. However, after only two shaves the metal pins that hold the blade into the handle separated. Very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Great razor for the money - Make sure to prep it before using
customer_reviews.text: This razor is a great way to get started with straight razors. With the money you save on the razor, spend a little extra on a good strop (wide enough and long enough). You can thank me later. DON'T ship this step otherwise you'll just get frustrated. Once it's prepped, you'll enjoy a great shave and you'll be well on your way to achieving your man card!
customer_reviews.author: bschram

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp, not sure, gives razor burn
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user. Cant tell if it is sharp or not, but got a severe razor burn even after using ample moisturizer after using it. Not sure if this is typical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good razor, hone before using
customer_reviews.text: Razor is good quality. But don't expect a product you can use immediately when you get it. I tried and destroyed my face. Must be honed before use. Other than that can't complain about the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Marriner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed again!
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst razor I have ever owned. It shaved better out of the box then it did after I sharpened it. Used a stone and a strap. The worst!!! I would like to have my money back. I tried a 2nd razor with the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good razor, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very tight and comfortable design, I've never used a straight razor before and this product did a great job. I was quite easily able to shave hair off my arm out of the box and after stroping the blade it easily cleaned up and even trimmed my beard and mustache. Definitely like this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: So I'm new to using straight edge razors but this one is perfect. I bought a cheaper version before and it was trash. This is the real deal, very sharp if you haven't used one check YouTube it'll help. You need to use it at an angle and really take your time but it's the closest shave you can get
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Williams

customer_reviews.title: You'll look even more classy shaving with this
customer_reviews.text: Loves the wood handle. Carved it up and gave it to my best friend as a work present
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Great value cuts smooth
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. Great value I use it every day. Make sure you have a good stope and use it before and after each use and this razor is very functional.
customer_reviews.author: mrbosnic

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shave
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm currently unemployed due to the Pandemic...I'll go for a week between shaves. This Razor has no problems. It's an enjoyable shave. If you're bored with the same old routine shaving, change it up, grow a pair and shave like a boss.
customer_reviews.author: tim coleman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to order and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a Christmas present for my son. Haven't given it to him yet, but he chose it, so I'm sure he'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Force

customer_reviews.title: Reservoir Shave
customer_reviews.text: Quality, easy to use, and so lovely to look at. This went well with my reservoir Dogs cosplay, and gave me a clean shave. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Camoflaugin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. But you gotta work on that edge to shave with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time to buy a straight razor. It took a little work to get that edge sharp enough to shave with. Otherwise this razor seems pretty good
customer_reviews.author: John Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.text: I'd what people reviewing this are saying it isn't shave ready from the package. The razor came in a nice leather holder, real wood handles. Tried it on a patch of arm hair just to get a feel for how sharp it is. It definitely has a shaving edge. It cleanly cut the hair quickly and easily. For the money, its a decent razor to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: kyle kraft

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sharp and ready to use.
customer_reviews.text: Came in very fast and with tracking. Arrived sharpened and ready to use. Great quality even better price. I'm new to this so I didn't want to go for the 80 dollar blades. This one guys well in the hand and is balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Twombly

customer_reviews.title: Careful not to nick yourself with this quality light Razor
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. I’m trying more traditional shaving methods, I have nicked myself and sharping is simple enough. Overall I am content with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Sharp AF! If you haven’t used one before, be careful. Looks and feels nice in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: VALERIO HENRIQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving razor for the money
customer_reviews.text: While not exactly shave ready, it only took a few round trips on the strop to get it there. Very easy to control. Nice tight fit between razor and handles. A pleasure to shave with this wonderful razor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard weilandt

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Some reviewers said it wasnt shave ready
customer_reviews.text: Shave ready. I love it. Some reviewers said it wasnt shave ready. Mine was. Bought all the necessary equipment for a straight shave. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pick

customer_reviews.title: Best for your buck hands down
customer_reviews.text: Its craftsmanship is fantastic this is the one to go with just the quality for a stright razor is perfect. I was looking for a stright razor and this is the one to go eith if you are a beginner, your first time, or a professional. Apart from being amazing for a razor it aesthetically looks amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a case.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with a very very sharp blade. Good sized handle. Have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: BearSpirit

customer_reviews.title: Strait razor that shaved right out the box.
customer_reviews.text: ATShoper, Yes I received the replacement Razor and I am 100% satisfied. It is the best Razor I have ever used. It shaved my hard beard right out of the box. I Highly Recommend this produt for starters and seasoned as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bevel warped but good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Warped bevel but company issued a new one good customer service still has to sharpen new one to be used to shave though But cheap razor
customer_reviews.author: Jon d

customer_reviews.title: I got this August 30, 2019 ; I will update if it survives for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.text: New to Straight Razors but from my take of it the blade is good enough for cutting hair. The wood on the other hand could use more work but would most likely drive the cost up so I'm not deducting any points just because it's affordable and is good enough for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Totally Unbiased Review

customer_reviews.title: Some Flaws but generally very good
customer_reviews.text: The Razor tends to loose its edge very quickly but with a good stopping session shines back to life. It feels very well put together for the price and would recommend for the beginner who doesnt want to outlay alot of money for a straight razor. The blade is of an acceptable standard but the handle sure leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Tanesh Nathoo

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who is very particular about his straight razors, and he loves it. The product gives a close shave, sharpens up nicely, and it doesn't hurt that it looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Channon T.

customer_reviews.title: Usage
customer_reviews.text: Razor came super sharp, which made it very easy to trim. Sheath is very well stitched and hardy. The wooden handle gives it a very natural feeling and the design/blade isn't too long, but great for beginners. Highly recommend and the price is very fair as well.
customer_reviews.author: sod

customer_reviews.title: Take your time- it will reward you
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first straight razor- stropped it about 100 times on each side of the strop- it works well- got a decent shave- take your time and work with it and it will do just fine- it’s a skill, not a bic- lookin forward to more and better shaves as I master it
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hays

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp
customer_reviews.text: I like this razor, it’s sharp and confortable on hand. It’s made well, I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Rust everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Had it close by the shower and didn't think the steam would make it rust.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not great but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Dull and drags but what I'd expect out of a razor this cheap, I got it to see if I liked the experience of shaving with a straight razor enough to purchase one with a nice blade, served that purpose well
customer_reviews.author: Xtian

customer_reviews.title: This Razor Is A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This razor is absolutely worth the price. Excellent for beginners attempting to learn the honing, stropping and wet shave process. After improving my technique at honing and stropping, I now use this razor every morning with great results.
customer_reviews.author: David R Jaquith

customer_reviews.title: It'll be fine after honing
customer_reviews.text: Mine needed about 10 minutes on the strop to cut my arm hairs (very light and thin). Will be honing for a while yet to get it ready for my face
customer_reviews.author: John Corella

customer_reviews.title: A good blade although a bit dull.
customer_reviews.text: I like to have this blade to shave with. I wish it was sharper. I need to find a good way to sharpen this blade.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice razor, bought as a present. They are very happy with it. Surprised they could get a old style wood handle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pranter

customer_reviews.title: quality make
customer_reviews.text: This razor appears to be well made and of quality materials. It arrived quite sharp by the way, and holds a good edge. A black leather case come with it of lighter but solid build
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely a good product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Great deal for a true straight razor. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for an inexpensive straight razor aka best bang for their buck.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Sharp quality steel at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The razor arrived promptly, and it is exactly as described. Beautiful wood scales and fine blade. I found it to be sharp enough to shave right out of the box. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for quality merchandise at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just go ahead and buy an expensive blade.
customer_reviews.text: The blade was cracked upon opening. Not a shipping damage crack, a forging crack. You can follow it about halfway up the blade. Handle is cheaply made, stain all over handle, blade, and plastic package. Also not sharp enough to shave facial hair.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Oldfashioned and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, sturdy. Good hand grip, good weight. Only problem I encounter is that the blade is so hard that I have trouble sharpening it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W de Graaf

customer_reviews.title: Shave ready
customer_reviews.text: The razor came ealier then expected clean it and prep for a shave WOW nice shave I like it great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Torres

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but not sharp at all. Took me about 45 minutes to even get it close to a crummy shave. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Impressive straight razor
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp but easy to use. Blade has a long life as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: The quality and service.
customer_reviews.text: After initially testing the razor, I am pleased to say the razor was decently sharp I acchieved a nice clean shave. The quality of the handle and the carbon steel blade is up to par with top competitors. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: Straight Razor Natural Wood Scale Handmade – Sharp, Steel Cutthroat Straight Edge Blade, Vintage Wood Handle, Barber Approved
feature_bullets: Classic vintage style straight edge razor, high quality.
Blade pre-sharpened manually, ready for stropping, made by quality solid carbon steel, edge holding.
Scale made by mahogany wood, polished without painting, unique color for each. Contoured to fit your palm well
Hollow design is conducive to dry razor after use.
Comfort in use, smooth and easily for traditional shaving.

specifications.Manufacturer: Yangjiang Rentutu Shaver Industry & Trade Co. Ltd.
